00298 //
00299 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une grandeur scalaire
00300 //
00301 
00302 ////!< flux_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00303 //
00304 
00305 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00306                                                const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00307                                                int num1) const
00308 {
00309   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00310   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00311   double flux;
00312   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00313   double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00314   if (n0 != -1)
00315     {
00316       if (psc > 0)
00317         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00318       else
00319         flux= psc*T_imp;
00320     }
00321   else   //!< n1 != -1
00322     {
00323       if (psc>0)
00324         flux= psc*T_imp;
00325       else
00326         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00327     }
00328   return -flux;
00329 }
00330 
00331 ////!< coeffs_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00332 //
00333 
00334 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int num1,const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00335                                                double& aii, double& ajj) const
00336 {
00337   int i = elem_(face,0);
00338 // int j = elem(face,1);
00339   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00340 
00341   if (i != -1)
00342     {
00343       if (psc > 0)
00344         aii = -psc;
00345     }
00346   else   //!< j != -1
00347     {
00348       if (psc<0)
00349         ajj = -psc;
00350     }
00351 }
00352 
00353 ////!< secmem_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00354 //
00355 
00356 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00357                                                  int num1) const
00358 {
00359   int i = elem_(face,0);
00360 // int j = elem(face,1);
00361   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00362   double flux=0;
00363   double T_imp = la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00364   if (i != -1)
00365     {
00366       if (psc < 0)
00367         flux = psc*T_imp;
00368     }
00369   else   //!< j != -1
00370     {
00371       if (psc>0)
00372         flux = psc*T_imp;
00373     }
00374   return -flux;
00375 }

00529 ////!< flux_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00530 //
00531 
00532 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00533                                                const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1) const
00534 {
00535   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00536   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00537   double flux;
00538   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00539   if (n0 != -1)
00540     {
00541       if (psc > 0)
00542         flux= psc*inco[n0];
00543       else
00544         flux= psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00545     }
00546   else   //!< n1 != -1
00547     {
00548       if (psc > 0)
00549         flux=psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00550       else
00551         flux= psc*inco[n1];
00552     }
00553   return -flux;
00554 }
00555 
00556 ////!< coeffs_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00557 //
00558 
00559 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int num1, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
00560                                                double& aii, double& ajj) const
00561 {
00562   int i = elem_(face,0);
00563 // int j = elem(face,1);
00564   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00565   if (i != -1)
00566     {
00567       if (psc > 0)
00568         aii = -psc;
00569     }
00570   else   //!< n1 != -1
00571     {
00572       if (psc < 0)
00573         ajj = -psc;
00574     }
00575 }
00576 
00577 ////!< secmem_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
00578 //
00579 
00580 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl, int num1) const
00581 {
00582   double flux=0;
00583   int i = elem_(face,0);
00584 // int j = elem(face,1);
00585   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00586   if (i != -1)
00587     {
00588       if (psc < 0)
00589         flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00590     }
00591   else   //!< j != -1
00592     {
00593       if (psc > 0)
00594         flux = psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1);
00595     }
00596   return -flux;
00597 }
00598

00603                                                const Symetrie&, int ) const
00604 {

00623 
00624 ////!< flux_face avec Periodique 
00625 //
00626 
00627 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00628                                                const Periodique& la_cl, int ) const
00629 {
00630 // 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
00631 
00632   double flux;
00633   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00634   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00635   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00636   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00637   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00638 
00639 // on applique le schema centre d'ordre 2
00640 
00641 // flux = 0.5*(inco(n0)+inco(n1))*psc ;
00642 // Ancien codage : on appelle le centre4
00643   flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00644 
00645   return -flux;
00646 }
00647 
00648 ////!< coeffs_face avec Periodique 
00649 //
00650 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int,const Periodique& la_cl, double& aii, double& ajj) const
00651 {
00652 // 30/05/2002 : Codage Periodicite.
00653 // ALEX C.
00654 
00655   int i = elem_(face,0);
00656   int j = elem_(face,1);
00657   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00658   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00659   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00660 
00661 // on applique le schema centre4
00662   if (psc > 0)
00663 // aii = -0.5*(transporte(i)+transporte(j));
00664     aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00665   else
00666 // ajj = -0.5*(transporte(i)+transporte(j));
00667     ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00668 }
00669 
00670 ////!< secmem_face avec Periodique 
00671 //
00672 
00673 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int, const Periodique&, int ) const
00674 {
00675   return 0;
00676 }
00677 
00678 
00679 ////!< flux_face avec NSCBC 
00680 //
00681 
00682 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00683                                                const NSCBC& la_cl, int num1) const
00684 {
00685   double flux=0.;
00686   Cerr<<"Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face n'est pas codee"<<finl;
00687   Cerr<<"pour la condition NSCBC"<<finl;
00688   Process::exit();
00689   return -flux;
00690 }
00691 
00692 ////!< coeffs_face avec NSCBC 
00693 //
00694 
00695 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int num1, const NSCBC& la_cl,
00696                                                double& aii, double& ajj) const
00697 {
00698   Cerr<<"Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face n'est pas codee"<<finl;
00699   Cerr<<"pour la condition NSCBC"<<finl;
00700   Process::exit();
00701 }
00702 
00703 ////!< secmem_face avec Neumann_NSCBC 
00704 //
00705 
00706 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const NSCBC& la_cl, int num1) const
00707 {
00708   double flux=0;
00709   Cerr<<"Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_face n'est pas codee"<<finl;
00710   Cerr<<"pour la condition NSCBC"<<finl;
00711   Process::exit();
00712   return flux;
00713 }
00714 
00715 
00716 
00717 ////!< flux_faces_interne 
00718 //
00719 
00720 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_faces_interne(const DoubleTab& inco, int face) const
00721 {
00722   double flux;
00723   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00724   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00725   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00726   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00727   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00728 
00729   if ( (n0_0 == -1) || (n1_1 == -1) )
00730 // Alexandre C. : 19/02/2003
00731 // We do not use the first order upwind scheme as it was done before
00732 // because in LES computations all turbulence is damped and we can not
00733 // recover a proper behaviour of physical turbulent characteristics,
00734 // especially when using wall-functions.
00735 // Therefore we use the 2nd order centered scheme.
00736     flux = psc*(inco(n0)+inco(n1))/2.;
00737   else  //!< on applique le schema centre4
00738     flux = qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco);
00739   return -flux;
00740 }
00741 
00742 ////!< coeffs_faces_interne 
00743 //
00744 
00745 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne(int face, double& aii, double& ajj ) const
00746 {
00747   int i = elem_(face,0);
00748   int j = elem_(face,1);
00749   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
00750   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
00751   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
00752 
00753   if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont
00754     if (psc > 0)
00755       aii = -psc;
00756     else
00757       ajj = -psc;
00758 
00759   else  //!< on applique le schema centre4
00760     if (psc > 0)
00761       aii = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00762     else
00763       ajj = -qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs());
00764 }
00765 
00766 ////!< secmem_faces_interne 
00767 //
00768 
00769 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_faces_interne(int) const
00770 {
00771   return 0;
00772 }
00773 
00774 
00775 //
00776 // Fonctions de calcul des flux pour une grandeur vectorielle
00777 //
00778 
00779 ////!< flux_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00780 //
00781 
00782 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
00783                                              const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00784                                              int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
00785 {
00786   int k;
00787   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
00788   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
00789   double psc = dt_vitesse(face)*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00790 
00791   if (n0 != -1)
00792     {
00793       if (psc > 0)
00794         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00795           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n0,k);
00796       else
00797         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00798           flux(k)= -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1,k);
00799     }
00800   else //!< n1 != -1
00801     {
00802       if (psc>0)
00803         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00804           flux(k)= -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1,k);
00805       else
00806         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00807           flux(k)= -psc*inco(n1,k);
00808     }
00809 }
00810 
00811 ////!< coeffs_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00812 //
00813 
00814 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face, int num1,const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl,
00815                                                DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj) const
00816 {
00817   int k;
00818   int i = elem_(face,0);
00819 // int j = elem(face,1);
00820   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00821   if (i != -1)
00822     {
00823       if (psc > 0)
00824         for(k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
00825           aii(k) = -psc;
00826     }
00827   else   //!< j != -1
00828     {
00829       if (psc < 0)
00830         for(k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
00831           ajj(k) = -psc;
00832     }
00833 }
00834 
00835 ////!< secmem_face avec Dirichlet_entree_fluide 
00836 //
00837 
00838 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int face, const Dirichlet_entree_fluide& la_cl, int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
00839 {
00840   int k;
00841   int i = elem_(face,0);
00842 // int j = elem(face,1);
00843   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
00844   if (i != -1)
00845     {
00846       if (psc < 0)
00847         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00848           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00849     }
00850   else   //!< j != -1
00851     {
00852       if (psc > 0)
00853         for(k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
00854           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_imp(face-num1);
00855     }
00856 }

01020 ////!< flux_face avec Neumann_sortie_libre 
01021 //
01022 
01023 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
01024                                              const Neumann_sortie_libre& la_cl,
01025                                              int num1, DoubleVect& flux) const
01026 {
01027   int k;
01028   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01029   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01030   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01031   if (n0 != -1)
01032     {
01033       if (psc > 0)
01034         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01035           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n0,k);
01036       else
01037         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01038           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
01039     }
01040   else  //!< n1 != -1
01041     {
01042       if (psc > 0)
01043         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01044           flux(k) = -psc*la_cl.val_ext(face-num1,k);
01045       else
01046         for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01047           flux(k) = -psc*inco(n1,k);
01048     }
01049 }

01058   int i = elem_(face,0);
01059 // int j = elem(face,1);
01060   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01061   if (i != -1)
01062     {
01063       if (psc > 0)
01064         for(k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01065           aii(k) = -psc;
01066     }
01067   else   //!< n1 != -1
01068     {
01069       if (psc < 0)
01070         for(k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01071           ajj(k) = -psc;
01072     }
01073 }

01125 ////!< flux_face avec Periodique 
01126 //
01127 
01128 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_face(const DoubleTab& inco, int face,
01129                                              const Periodique& la_cl,
01130                                              int, DoubleVect& flux) const
01131 {
01132 // ALEX2 C.
01133   int k;
01134   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01135   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01136   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01137   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01138   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01139 
01140 // on applique le schema centre4
01141   qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco,flux);
01142   for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01143     flux(k) *= -1;
01144 }
01145 
01146 ////!< coeffs_face avec Periodique 
01147 //
01148 
01149 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_face(int face,int, const Periodique& la_cl,
01150                                                DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj) const
01151 {
01152 // Codage Periodique
01153 // ALEX C.
01154   int k;
01155   int i = elem_(face,0);
01156   int j = elem_(face,1);
01157   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01158   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01159   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
01160   ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());
01161 
01162 // on applique le schema centre4
01163   qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
01164   if (psc > 0)
01165     for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01166       aii(k) = -flux(k);
01167   else
01168     for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01169       ajj(k) = -flux(k);
01170 }
01171 
01172 ////!< secmem_face avec Periodique 
01173 //
01174 
01175 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_face(int, const Periodique&,
01176                                                int, DoubleVect&) const
01177 {
01178   ;
01179 }
01180 
01181 ////!< flux_faces_interne 
01182 //
01183 
01184 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::flux_faces_interne(const DoubleTab& inco,
01185                                                       int face,DoubleVect& flux) const
01186 {
01187   int k;
01188   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface(face)*porosite(face);
01189   int n0 = elem_(face,0);
01190   int n1 = elem_(face,1);
01191   int n0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01192   int n1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01193 
01194   if ( (n0_0 == -1) || (n1_1 == -1) )
01195 // Alexandre C. : 19/02/2003
01196 // We do not use the first order upwind scheme as it was done before
01197 // because in LES computations all turbulence is damped and we can not
01198 // recover a proper behaviour of physical turbulent characteristics,
01199 // especially when using wall-functions !
01200 // Therefore we use the 2nd order centered scheme.
01201     for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01202       flux(k) = -psc*(inco(n0,k)+inco(n1,k))/2.;
01203   else //!< on applique le schema centre4
01204     {
01205       qcentre(psc,n0,n1,n0_0,n1_1,face,inco,flux);
01206       for (k=0; k<flux.size(); k++)
01207         flux(k) *= -1;
01208     }
01209 }
01210 
01211 ////!< coeffs_faces_interne 
01212 //
01213 
01214 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::coeffs_faces_interne(int face, DoubleVect& aii, DoubleVect& ajj ) const
01215 {
01216   int k;
01217   int i = elem_(face,0);
01218   int j = elem_(face,1);
01219   int i0_0 = amont_amont(face,0);
01220   int j1_1 = amont_amont(face,1);
01221   double psc = dt_vitesse[face]*surface[face]*porosite[face];
01222   ArrOfDouble flux(aii.size());
01223 
01224   if ( (i0_0 == -1) || (j1_1 == -1) ) //!< on applique le schema amont
01225     if (psc > 0)
01226       for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01227         aii(k) = -psc;
01228     else
01229       for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01230         ajj(k) = -psc;
01231 
01232   else  //!< on applique le schema centre4
01233     {
01234       qcentre(psc,i,j,i0_0,j1_1,face,inconnue->valeurs(),flux);
01235       if (psc > 0)
01236         for (k=0; k<aii.size(); k++)
01237           aii(k) = -flux(k);
01238       else
01239         for (k=0; k<ajj.size(); k++)
01240           ajj(k) = -flux(k);
01241     }
01242 }
01243 
01244 
01245 ////!< secmem_faces_interne 
01246 //
01247 
01248 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::secmem_faces_interne(int, DoubleVect& ) const
01249 {
01250   ;
01251 }
01252 
01253 ////!< Fram4 
01254 //
01255 
01256 inline double Fram4(const double& s1,const double& s2,
01257                     const double& s3,const double& s4)
01258 {
01259   double smin0 = dmin(s4,s2);
01260   double smax0 = dmax(s4,s2);
01261   double smin1 = dmin(s3,s1);
01262   double smax1 = dmax(s3,s1);
01263   double sr0 = (s3-smin0)/(smax0-smin0+DMINFLOAT);
01264   double sr1 = (s2-smin1)/(smax1-smin1+DMINFLOAT);
01265   double fr = 2.*dmax(dabs(sr0-0.5),dabs(sr1-0.5));
01266   fr *= fr;
01267   fr *= fr;
01268   return dmin(fr,1.0);
01269 }
01270 
01271 
01272 ////!< amont_amont 
01273 //
01274 
01275 inline int Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::amont_amont(int face, int i) const
01276 {
01277   return la_zone->amont_amont(face, i);
01278 }
01279 
01280 
01281 ////!< qcentre pour un champ transporte scalaire 
01282 //
01283 
01284 inline double Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::qcentre(const double& psc, const int num0, const int num1,
01285                                              const int num0_0, const int num1_1, const int face,
01286                                              const DoubleTab& transporte) const
01287 {
01288 
01289   double flux;
01290   int ori = orientation(face);
01291 
01292   double dx   = dist_elem(num0, num1, ori);
01293   double dxam = dist_elem(num0_0, num0, ori);
01294   double dxav = dist_elem(num1, num1_1, ori);
01295 
01296 
01297   double T0 = transporte[num0];
01298   double T0_0 = transporte[num0_0];
01299   double T1 = transporte[num1];
01300   double T1_1 = transporte[num1_1];
01301 
01302 
01303   double g1 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxav)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*(dx+dxam)*dxam);
01304   double g2 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxam*(dx+dxav));
01305   double g3 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxav*(dx+dxam));
01306   double g4 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxam)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*dxav*(dx+dxav));
01307 
01308 
01309   flux =  g1*T0_0+g2*T0+g3*T1+g4*T1_1;
01310 
01311   return flux*psc;
01312 }
01313 
01314 
01315 ////!< qcentre pour un champ transporte vectoriel 
01316 //
01317 
01318 inline void Eval_centre4_VDF_Elem::qcentre(const double& psc, const int num0, const int num1,
01319                                            const int num0_0, const int num1_1, const int face,
01320                                            const DoubleTab& transporte,ArrOfDouble& flux) const
01321 {
01322 
01323   int k;
01324   int ncomp = flux.size_array();
01325 
01326   int ori = orientation(face);
01327   double dx   = dist_elem(num0, num1, ori);
01328   double dxam = dist_elem(num0_0, num0, ori);
01329   double dxav = dist_elem(num1, num1_1, ori);
01330 
01331   ArrOfDouble T0(ncomp);
01332   ArrOfDouble T0_0(ncomp);
01333   ArrOfDouble T1(ncomp);
01334   ArrOfDouble T1_1(ncomp);
01335 
01336   for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01337     {
01338       T0(k) = transporte(num0,k);
01339       T0_0(k) = transporte(num0_0,k);
01340       T1(k) = transporte(num1,k);
01341       T1_1(k) = transporte(num1_1,k);
01342     }
01343 
01344   double g1 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxav)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*(dx+dxam)*dxam);
01345   double g2 =  (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxam*(dx+dxav));
01346   double g3 = (dx+2*dxam)*(dx+2*dxav)/(8*dxav*(dx+dxam));
01347   double g4 = -dx*dx*(dx/2+dxam)/(4*(dx+dxam+dxav)*dxav*(dx+dxav));
01348 
01349   for (k=0; k<ncomp; k++)
01350     flux(k) =(  g1*T0_0(k) + g2*T0(k) + g3*T1(k) + g4*T1_1(k)  ) * psc ;
01351 }
01352 
01353 
01354 #endif
